column2: "Afei Zeruia ba Joab hun dɛ ɔhen no n’akoma wɔ Absalom ho."

column3: na wɔkɛfaa ɔbaa onyansafo bi fi hɔ bae
column4: na ɔsee no dɛ
column6: petuw ara yɛ woho dɛ eyiyɛnyi
column8: na mma mmfa ngo nnsera woho
column9: na yɛ dɛ ɔbaa a ogyaam ewufo akyɛr:"

column3: na kɛka dɛm nsɛm yi kyerɛ no. Nna Joab dze nsɛm hyɛɛ n’ano."

column2: "Na aber a ɔbaa no a ofi Tekoa no baa ɔhen no nkyɛn no
column4: na ɔyɛɛ enyidzi

column3: Ebɛnadze na ɔyɛ wo? Na obuaa dɛ
column4: Ampa meyɛ ɔbaa kunafo

column3: na hɔn beenu no dzii aperper wɔ haban mu
column4: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔpata hɔn
ebusua no nyina asoɛr wɔ w’afonabaa do
column6: Yi nyia ɔbɔɔ no nua no ma
column7: ma yenku no wɔ no nua no a okum no no nkwa ntsi
column8: na dɛm na yɛbɛsɛɛ ɔdzedzifo no so: na wɔdze dɛm rubodum me gyansenama a aka no
column9: na woenngyaa dzin anaa okyirkafo so amma mo kun wɔ asaase yi do."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see ɔbaa no dɛ
column4: na mebɛhyɛ mbra wɔ wo ho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no a ofi Tekoa no see ɔhen no dɛ
column4: asodzi no nda mo do
column5: na m’egya ne fi do: na ɔhen na n’ahengua no ndzi bem."

column4: fa no brɛ me
wɔmma ɔhen nkaa EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column5: amma bɔgya ho werdzifo no aannsɛɛ obi bio
column6: ɔno bɛyɛ na wɔaasɛɛ me ba a ɔka no. Na ɔsee dɛ
column8: wo ba no nhwi kor mpo ronntɔ famu."

column4: ma w’afonabaa nka asɛm kor nkyerɛ mo wura ɔhen. Na ɔsee dɛ

column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na esusu dɛm adze yi etsia Nyankopɔn ne man yi? Osiandɛ asɛm yi ne nkaa mu no ɔhen yɛ dɛ obi a odzi fɔ
column4: ɔhen rennkɛfa ne nyimpa a wɔapam no no mmba fie bio."

column3: na yɛtse dɛ nsu a woehue egu famu a wɔboaboa ano bio a ɔnnyɛ; nkyii so Nyankopɔn nnyi nkwa
column4: mbom osusu ɔkwan
column5: ama nyia wɔapam no no aannyɛ ɔkwankwannyi na oemmfi ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei ɔnam dɛ maba dɛ merebɛka asɛm yi akyerɛ mo wura ɔhen no
column3: nna ne siantsir nye dɛ ɔman no ayɛ me ma musuro: na w’afonabaa see dɛ
column4: afei mebɛkasa makyerɛ ɔhen; annyɛ a ɔhen bɛyɛ n’abaawa n’ebisadze no."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔhen betsie na oeyi n’abaawa efi nyimpa no a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ emi na me ba nyina fi Nyankopɔn egyapadze ho no ne nsamu."

column4: wɔmma mo wura ɔhen n’asɛm nyɛ awerɛkyekyer: na dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe tse no
column5: dɛmara so na mo wura ɔhen tse
column6: dɛ ohu papa na bɔn mu: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndzi w’ekyir."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no buae see ɔbaa no dɛ
column4: mma nnsiw me biribiara a mibebisa wo no do. Na ɔbaa no see dɛ
column5: Wɔmma afei mo wura ɔhen nkasa ɛ."

column3: Ana Joab ne nsa ka wo ho wɔ iyi nyinara mu a? Na ɔbaa no buae see dɛ
column4: Mo wura ɔhen
column5: dɛ wo kra tse ase yi
column6: obi runntum nndan mmfi asɛm a mo wura ɔhen aka no ho mmfa enyimfa anaa abankum: na w’akowaa Joab
column8: na ɔnoara na ɔdze nsɛm yi nyinara hyɛɛ w’afonabaa n’ano:"

column2: "dɛ ɔbɛdan asɛm no n’enyi ntsi na w’akowaa Joab ayɛ adze yi: na mo wura yɛ onyansafo
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn bɔfoe ne nyansaa tse
column4: dɛ obohu dza ɔwɔ asaase do nyinara."
Afei hwɛ
column5: mayɛ dza epɛ: dɛm ntsi kɔ

column4: na ohyiraa ɔhen no: na Joab see dɛ
column5: Ndɛ na w’akowaa ehu dɛ menya w’enyim enyimnyam
column7: dɛ ɔhen ayɛ n’akowaa n’ebisadze yi."

column2: "Nna Joab soɛree na osii mu kɔr Gesur

column3: Wɔmma ɔmman nkɔ nankasa ne fie
column4: na mma wɔmma onnhu m’enyim. Nna Absalom manee kɔr nankasa ne fie

column2: "Afei obi nnyi Israel nyinara mu a wɔkamfo n’ahoɔfɛw dodow dɛm dɛ Absalom: ofi n’ananadze araa dze kodu n’etsifi pampamu no dzɛm biara nnyi no ho."

column3: (afei afrenhyia biara n’ewiei oyi: osiandɛ nhwi no yɛ no do dur dodow:) oker ne tsinhwi no ma ɔtow dwetɛbona ahaenu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen n’abrambo tse."

column3: na ɔbabaa kor a ne dzin dze Tamar: ɔyɛ ɔbaa a n’enyim yɛ fɛw."

column2: "Na Absalom tsenaa Jerusalɛm mfe pɔrpɔr ebien; na oennhu ɔhen no n’enyim da."

column3: dɛ ɔrosoma no wɔ ɔhen nkyɛn; na ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔba ne nkyɛn: na ɔsomaa bio ne mpɛn ebien
column4: na ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔba."
Joab ne haban bɛn medze
column5: na ɔwɔ atoko wɔ hɔ; hom nkɔ nkɔto mu gya."

column2: "Nna Joab soɛree na ɔbaa Absalom nkyɛn wɔ ne fie
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo nkowaa akɔto me haban mu gya yi?"
mosomae ma wɔbaa wo hɔ
column7: ma monsoma wo wɔ ɔhen hɔ
column9: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mifi Gesur mebae? Oye ma me dɛ nkyɛ meda ho mowɔ hɔ: dɛm ntsi afei ma munhu ɔhen no n’enyim; na sɛ emumuyɛ bi wɔ mo mu a

column3: na ɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ no: na wɔkɛfrɛɛ Absalom no
column4: ɔbaa ɔhen no nkyɛn
column5: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze dze n’enyim boom famu wɔ ɔhen no enyim: na ɔhen no feew Absalom n’ano."
